actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to regulate the training of aliens to operate jet-propelled aircraft, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal aviation law to prohibit a person from providing training in the operation of any jet-propelled aircraft to any alien within the United States unless the Attorney General certifies to such person that a background investigation of such alien has been completed. Requires the Attorney General, upon the joint request of the person and the alien, to carry out such a background investigation and issue such a certificate. Sets forth administrative sanctions for violations of the requirements of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to regulate the training of aliens to operate jet-propelled aircraft, and for other purposes.
